item.title: about
item.description: Deconstruct materiality. Reconstruct spirituality. Biography Yi Zhu is an artist in the evolving time of the Chinese society. He has experienced the dramatic change of the social economic structures of China, which has influenced and shaped his worldview. In his early career, he created artworks in print making and illustration with unique perspectives and compositions. He has also pioneered in point-of-sale advertising design works in China with his commercial design company.
